title: [Question] Scholarship details required
content:
1) If I pay extra 10K for scholarship and I don't have a bank account right now can I ask them to give me a few days to create one or should I have one while doing admission

2) Can I apply for other scholarship (Like ssp etc) while I have already applied for scholarship in PESU, like can I get fees amount from two scholarships at same time

comments.body:
1. You can do it anytime before first sem results.
2. Yes
is it compulsory to pay 10k for registration ?
If you are from KCET and want to get pesu scholarship then yes, otherwise no
i'm so sorry to ask this here, as i had no idea. how does one apply for the scholarship? where do we pay? (i came through jee mains)
I think there's no application form to it, u just need to pay extra, but ask from others also this is what I heard
